title: RIL partners with Oberoi Hotels to co-manage hospitality projects
description: Reliance Industries has partnered with The Oberoi Hotels and Resorts to co-manage three hospitality projects, including the Anant Vilas Hotel in Mumbai's Bandra Kurla Complex, Stoke Park in the UK, and another project in Gujarat. The Mumbai Anant Vilas hotel aims to offer an iconic experience in the bustling business district.
